revision.text: <onlyinclude>The {{Class|PowerSpeed}} base class defines the following properties which are available to all subclasses: * '''{{LE|PowerSpeed.NoTrail}}''' ''value'' :If set to 1, it disables the {{Class|PlayerSpeedTrail|speed trail effect}} that is created while the player is moving. :Default is 0.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
